Articles.Content:
Played the first KSP a lot and am liking what I see in KSP2. Noticed to things I thought I would comment on. They are not big issues, but reporting what I notice. Otherwise LOVE THE GAME SO FAR!!!!!!!!!! 

1) LED Lights on keyboard for my Logitech G710+ turn off when I start the game so I cannot "see" the keys.

2) Multiple monitor resolution seems to not be supported.
